Description: Unique identifier for each row in the dataset.
Unique identifier for each customer order.
Date when the order was placed.
Date when the order was shipped.
Shipping method used for the order (e.g., Standard Class, First Class).
Unique identifier for each customer.
Name of the customer who placed the order.
Customer segment (e.g., Consumer, Corporate, Home Office).
Country where the order was delivered (all entries: USA).
City where the order was delivered.
State where the order was delivered.
Postal code for the delivery address.
Geographic region (East, West, North, South).
Unique identifier for each product.
High-level grouping of products (e.g., Furniture, Office Supplies).
Detailed grouping of products (e.g., Chairs, Binders).
Name of the product sold.
Revenue generated from the sale of products.
Number of items sold.
Discount applied to the sale.
Profit earned from the sale of products.
